# E-commerce Application

## Overview
Building a full-stack e-commerce platform.

## Tasks
- [ ] Set up the solution structure with a React frontend and an ASP.NET Core Web API backend, including CORS configuration for local development
- [ ] Create the product data contract (DTO/model) and validation rules (required fields, price as decimal, quantity as integer) shared consistently between frontend and backend
- [ ] Implement backend CRUD endpoints for products (create, list, update, delete) using Entity Framework Core with SQL Server and basic error handling
- [ ] Build the React UI for listing products and a form to add/edit products with fields: name, description, category, price, and stock quantity
- [ ] Wire the React app to the backend API (fetch/axios), including optimistic UI updates or refresh logic and user-friendly error states
